i like star wars.  i like yoda.

"Does this one not have the english subtitles for alien parts as well?"

"SUBTiTLES.......: N/A"

NA means not applicable or not available. No subtitles for these three films. It's possible to download the subtitles from another website and use MKVMerge to add them to the file.

is liam neeson in episode III?

"is liam neeson in episode III?"

His character, Qui-Gon Jinn, was killed in Episode 1. Perhaps George Lucas added a CGI ghost of Qui into episode three along with the deleted Jar Jar Binks 'naked in shower' scene.
